about_the_game:
Summer Warfare Pack

Summer has arrived and with it a new uniform for the US Infantry.

Uniform Pack includes:

US M1943 Combat Uniform

Pack unlocks for all roles (except Armor and Commander) at level Role Level 7 and is available for free for a limited time as a thank you to our community!
detailed_description:
Summer Warfare Pack

Summer has arrived and with it a new uniform for the US Infantry.

Uniform Pack includes:

US M1943 Combat Uniform

Pack unlocks for all roles (except Armor and Commander) at level Role Level 7 and is available for free for a limited time as a thank you to our community!

name: Hell Let Loose - Summer Warfare Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7 64bit
  • Processor: i3-4130 @ 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0GHz (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050ti / R9 280 (or equivalent with minimum 2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements subject to change as development continues
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7 64bit
  • Processor: i5-7600 @ 3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or AMD RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements subject to change as development continues

short_description: Summer has arrived and with it a new uniform for the US Infantry. Uniform Pack includes: US M1943 Combat Uniform Pack available for free for a limited time as a thank you to our community!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese
